channel.title: Blended Learning :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: This page covers what to expect during in-class time for students enrolled in a LaunchCode blended learning course. Students taking an independent learning course may skip this page. We only have a short amount of time in class to learn a lot, so using a blended learning model helps us make the most of our time in this course. A blended learning model incorporates in-class learning with online materials like this textbook.
